game_description: There is a Unity Cube, and a skybox, and avatar hands. The perfect experience that will make all VR developers to cry of joy. A must have to show your love for Unity development.
review_1: While playing this game I realized the beauty of simple things in life this game isn't only about that though it's about well playing the game so how is the game? I hear you ask.Well it's amazing because i won't spoil anything but ones you find the secret that's when the game begins, and the game has a lot of replayability and a lot of post game . One of the best VR experience's I have ever had . Must have game. And I am excited for The Unity Sphere, but the game also does what it's actually supposed to which many triple a titles can't do these days so it's good to see that game devs can still make good game's that do what they promised. 10/10
review_5: I have never had a experience so fulfilling and enjoyable in my life and I donâ€™t think I ever will again. The warmth and comfort of the cube has made me feel complete and connected to myself and my family better than ever before.
